name: Marzee Labs
description:
We are a web development company. We develop web products from scratch, improve your existing web platform, and provide technical consulting for large projects. We perform content architecture during an initial discovery phase, build either a website or an app, and tailor the design and user experience accordingly.
From content-heavy websites, community platforms, intranets, apps, e-commerce, simple marketing websites, whatever your project entails, we will guide you far beyond a minimum viable product and enhance your online presence.
Our team excels at both front-end architecture and back-end implementation with expertise in different technologies. From static sites to fully fledged Content Management Systems (CMS), we have a solution for you. By using the right tools for each project, we deliver perfectly fitted web platforms and ensure that you and your audience are happy with the digital product.
Our Offers:
Full-stack web development
Web consultancy
Content architecture
Discovery phase
UX/Design
Back-end and front-end implementation
Integration with external systems
Deployment to live systems, maintenance
Heavy editorial systems
READ MORE...
